3: וּבְמַ֤יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> רַבִּים֙ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>And by great</n> זֶ֣רַע <sup>2233 </sup> <n>the seed</n> שִׁחֹ֔ר <sup>7883 </sup> <n>of Sihor</n> קְצִ֥יר <sup>7105 </sup> <n>the harvest</n> יְא֖וֹר <sup>2975 </sup> <n>of the river</n> תְּבֽוּאָתָ֑הּ <sup>8393 </sup> <n>[is] her revenue</n> וַתְּהִ֖י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>is a</n> סְחַ֥ר <sup>5505 </sup> <n>and she is a mart</n> גּוֹיִֽם׃ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of nations</n>
